thread.section_title: Parts Town Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parts Town | partstown.com | 7 of 128
thread.title: Brian

author: Brian
title: Brian
text: I own a pizza shop and bought all of my equipment used so obviously things break and parts wear out from time to time. Having a little mechanical ability (and with the help of Partstown's online manuals), I've saved thousands of dollars in repairs by buying the parts online and doing the work myself. Every part I have needed thus far (probably around 20 orders) has been in stock and shipped very quickly. I'll be buying from this site for many many years to come.
